name: Barista Burgers
recipeIngredient: 5 tablespoons honey (preferably ThistleDew Farm West Virginia honey)
1/4 teaspoon Emeril's Essence (or Bayou Blast! Essence for a spicier burger)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a grill. In a large bowl, blend the ground round, ground chuck, onion, garlic, soy sauce, honey, Emeril's Essence and ginger.
Shape the mixture into six patties. Grill to taste. Serve on sourdough buns with lettuce, tomato and onion.
